summary: Implements a two-qubit parameterized XX+YY interaction gate (also known as an XY gate) that performs a coherent rotation by angle theta between the |01> and |10> states, with an optional phase beta applied to the first qubit. Provides the unitary matrix and circuit symbol for integration into quantum circuits.
business_intent: Enables quantum programmers to add an entangling XX+YY rotation to circuits, facilitating universal gate sets, simulation of spin-exchange Hamiltonians, and algorithms requiring iSWAP-like behavior or controlled swapping.
